com.mockrunner.example.struts

Class GreetingsActionTest

  • java.lang.Object
    • junit.framework.Assert
      • junit.framework.TestCase
        • com.mockrunner.base.BasicWebTestCase
          • com.mockrunner.base.BasicHTMLOutputTestCase
            • com.mockrunner.struts.BasicActionTestCaseAdapter
              • com.mockrunner.example.struts.GreetingsActionTest
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    junit.framework.Test

    public class GreetingsActionTest
extends BasicActionTestCaseAdapter
    Example test for the GreetingsAction. Please note that we cache the ValidatorResources in a static field. You don't need to do this, but the parsing of the files before every test method will slow down your tests.
